text:
We receive package from a suplier that, on some Linux RedHat ES3 machines,
doesn't deploy normaly with "Ant -f deploy.xml package" command. On theses
machine we have lib created with ANT that are double the size of the original
files. 
We suppect a untar problem, but we test the untaring of the package with both
tar 1.13 and 1.14 and both of theses utilities produce good files.
I suppect a Java problem, but we test the same version of Java on other machine
and it's works. 
So I suppect an ANT problem !
How ANT handle tgz archive ?
creator: denis.bergeron@telussa.com

text:
we would need more info about the deploy.xml Ant file that is triggering the
problem.  You should probably take this up with the supplier, who can then
follow it up with us if needed.  Marking as LATER.
creator: mbenson@apache.org
